Text: Thank you for staying with us for 30 days until someone finally got the whole file. Quality looks good. The file will not run in my standalone divX-dvd player, so I'll have to give it a few hours with Dr. DivX.

8/2007 This is ripped with the next to latest divx codec. I tested a couple of my rips in my divx/dvd player, a Toshiba, which I bought last Xmas at BJ's Wholewale club last Christmas.  My rips play fine in my player, which I purchased long before this version of the Divx codec was released. Also, there is no software updating service available with my player.Therefore, all I can say to people who have Divx players that won't play this is: you bought the wrong brand.

I cannot remeber the resolution of this movie, but a regular divx player will not play over a 720p movie. It may require an HQ Divx player. I tend to rip them in larger resolutions, especially old movies,because when the video is expanded to fit the tv screen, it also enlarges any flaws in the video. So the bigger the original, the less it has to increase in size to fill the screen and the smaller the flaws stay.
Could I get a reseed of Kasas City Bomber, thanks Rubber your obviously a huge Raquel fan as am I.
Good quality rip. Hard 2 find classic oldie.
